name: Repeat a Year! Todome-Senpai
nutshell:
Sato is a high school boy struggling with his grades, but that's the least of his worries. His childhood friend and former upperclassman Waseda Todome wants to spend time with him (the keyword being "former", as she's repeating the first year and now shares classrooms with Sato).
The problem lies with the fact that, while being cute and flirty, she's dumb as bricks, and intends to make him sabotage his own grades because she doesn't want to be alone at the bottom of the school's grade ranks. However, it turns out that she's dumb as bricks when it comes to that too…
Todome's poor planning has some unintended consequences, as it readily reveals that her intentions with Sato do not lie purely within the academic side of things… Will Sato take the hint, notwithstanding Todome's bad clues?

name: Neko to Watashi no Kinyoubi
nutshell: Ai loves cute things and chocolates. She feels she has become closer to her sempai. And when she was about to confess her love to him… something happened…

name: Steins;Gate 0
nutshell: A manga adaptation of the Steins;Gate 0 Visual Novel.

name: You Tell by Car!
nutshell: 4-chapter story about a duo of comedians. Includes the one-shot "Cleaning Beauty".

name: Gambling Outcast Kaiji - Kaiji Part 3
nutshell: Six months after the fight to the death with The Bog, Kaiji escapes from the underground and pays off his debts. Sakazaki gets fed up with Kaiji and tries to get rid of him by giving him 3 million yen as compensation. At that time, Kaiji is reunited with Miyoshi and Maeda, who were his friends in the underground, and they come up with a plan to swindle a large sum of money from Muraoka, the president of the underground casino where they work. Kaiji takes 3 million yen from Sakazaki, promising to pay it back, and plays a variant of mahjong called "17 Steps" invented by Muraoka.

name: Magic Night's Mask
nutshell: The "servant" of the demon boy group. There are cold and arrogant vampires, elegant and gentle dream-eaters, rebellious werewolves and adorable cat spirits in this group. Life as a demon is hard, they were forced to debut as a boy group to gain the "power of faith". Look at how Ling Xiao rose to the top, from the boy group's "servant" to "mentor", leading the four demons to the peak of demon life, shining so bright...... Eh? You said you like me? No no no, humans and demons cannot be together.... Anyways, it's impossible between us... Ahh~ This guy is so handsome (how ironic*)!!!

name: Kirai Kiraimo
nutshell:
The Konoe and Kazuki families have been fighting like cats and dogs for generations. Masaya Konoe and Yuma Kazuki attend the same elite high school and are known to all as arch rivals, but do they really hate each other? Masaya still cherishes a childhood memory of a time when Yuma shared a "treasure" with him. Now they share a secret attraction. Can they hide their passion? Burning desire has a way of erupting into flames!
The Deux published version of this manga does not include the short story called, "Water Lily". It's about two brothers where the younger brother is in a coma and the other takes care of him. The older brother molests his sleeping brother not realizing that his touches are being noticed.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - Papa to Jolyne to Josuke to! (Doujinshi)
Every Step Is My Reflection
nutshell:
After being sold to slave traders, Mirelys had no will to live on anymore…until her mana leaked out and caused an explosion in the building. An imagery of a mirror from her house shattered, that's when all her past life memories flooded into her. Mirelys Arjurine was a villainess in a book, and was also ruthlessly killed by the main protagonist, Duke Allen Chastein.
The Emperor of Emeriyal arrived at the scene only to see a ragged girl with hollow eyes.
"Papa, I want that thing." A boy with smooth, jet black hair pointed his finger at Mirelys.
With no hesitation, the emperor agreed to his son's request and brought home a castaway. Will Mirelys ever attain a true family bond she never had in her life, or does she have different intentions…?

name: The IT Revolution
nutshell: How the Internet affects our everyday life.

name: Conspiracy of a Reptile Girl
tags: Oneshot,Romance,Comedy,School Life,Monster Girls,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell: /x/ approved.

name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! dj - Nude Diamonds
nutshell:
Pairing: Yamamoto x Gokudera
Gokudera is worried about how Yamamoto will survive in the mafia and decides for his lover's sake they need to break up even though Yamamoto doesn't want to.

name: Trap
nutshell: Niia is a good student who always has top grade of the class. One day, his teacher found out that he’s smoker so to received recommendation letter from school, he’s willing to do anything for his teacher.

name: Inazuma Eleven: Baku Gaidenshuu
nutshell:
The first volume features different stories about the original cast's training sessions and special techniques. It fills in gaps that were never explained before and offers a new point of view about some in-game scenes.
The second volume recreates the world seen in the videogame "Inazuma Eleven Strikers" for Wii, from the point of view of Inazuma Japan. It features many characters from every season and situations only seen in said game.

name: Josou Off-Kai (Pre-Serialization)
nutshell:
Creator-approved translations by Kurisu.


Kurano's Pixiv
Kurano's Twitter
Support Kurano on Fanbox!

name: Kigatsuitara Boku Wa Kare Wo...
nutshell: a short twitter series by @BaitoTackey

name: Medarot - Hikaru Arc
nutshell:
A manga adaptation of the first Medarot game. Created by Horuma Rin, the artist for the game series.
The story follows Hikaru Agata and his medarot, Metabee's adventures.

name: Yuria-sensei no Akai Ito
nutshell:
Fifty-year-old Yuria has a quiet life teaching embroidery classes in her home, where she lives with her writer husband and his mother. Then one day her world is turned upside down when husband has a subarachnoid hemorrhage and upon arriving at the hospital, Yuria is met by a tearful young man who announces that he is her husband's lover.
Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award in General Category in 2021.

name: Fushigi Yugi
nutshell: Miaka Yuuki is an ordinary junior-high student who is suddenly whisked away into the world of a book, The Universe Of The Four Gods. There she becomes the priestess of the god Suzaku, and is charged with finding all seven of her Celestial-Warrior protectors.

name: Satan's Deepest Cry
nutshell: Oh, how unfair the heavens, and strange the world… Wings were forged for flight, so why has god forsaken the ducks, chickens, and ostriches? Teasing their dreams of soaring through the sky but confining them to the very earth. In a world where everyone is born with God's blessing, he is the only anomaly. Can Ergera outclass the God that abandoned him, whilst simultaneously saving the people he loves?

name: Descendants of Maoshan
nutshell: Zhang Guozhong opened the door to Maoshan Taoism because of a copy of "Maoshan Tuzhi" that he accidentally obtained. From exorcising ghosts and warding off evil spirits to exploring secrets and wonders, set foot in various regions and use Maoshan techniques to unravel the sleeping mysteries of the ages!

name: Furendoriina toritate-ya-san
nutshell:
¡Un cobrador rudo y entrometido reconstruye la vida de los deudores!
Sada es un cobrador que parece un matón, pero su lema es "¡Cobrar amistosamente!". Nao trabaja como vendedora para pagar la deuda que tiene su ex novio.
Está agobiada por las deudas de su padre, engañada por sus amigos y con dinero prestado de su querida madre...
¡Una conmovedora comedia en la que personas endeudadas por diversas razones conocen a Sada y descubren lo que es importante en sus vidas!

name: Emotion Chip
nutshell: Placed on the back of the neck, iMood can easily control emotions by pressing it lightly. In the short period of 20 years after iMood was born, the society seems to be in harmony, but the hidden crisis is the collapse of human emotions. Yu Qing Le is a police officer who also has an iMood addiction. The overture of a serial killer started from a dead woman nailed to the ceiling…

name: Aiming For the Deepest Part of the Labyrinth Thanks to "The Vessel of Talent" -What Was Supposed to be a Normal Progression of Skills Turned Out to be an All-Purpose Cheat!
nutshell: Ryo is suddenly transferred to another world and is given the "Vessel of Talent," an ability that grants him the choice to level any skill he wants. Armed with the strongest growth cheat, he sets out to explore the labyrinth to find out why he was transferred there!

name: Weak Demon Hunter
nutshell:
“Want to be rich? Then become an exorcist!” Byeongchun is living with his sick grandmother and his twin brothers, taking care of them. To make a living for the family, he quit sports which he really loved. He barely makes a living doing part time jobs. One day, he beats up someone who picked a fight on him. To his surprise, Byeongchun finds out that it was a ghost! Bisamgwang, the shaman, witnesses him beating up the ghost and asks him if he’s interested in running an exorcism business together.


Webtoon PV



Official Simplified Chinese Translation

name: Nondescript Friendship Yuri
nutshell:
After a long time without seeing her good friend from high school, Sayo receives a message from the popular friend making an appointment. Sayo is nervous, they haven't seen each other for a long time.

Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Depois de muito tempo sem ver sua boa amiga do ensino médio, Sayo recebe uma mensagem da popular amiga marcando uma visita. Sayo está nervosa, faz tempo que as duas não se veem.

name: Ao no Exorcist - Naorazu no Koi (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Shiro x Yukio
Link:
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon

name: Isekai ni Teni Shitara Yama no Naka datta. Handou de Tsuyo Sayori mo Kaitekisa o Erabi Mashita
nutshell: A protagonist enjoyed his Isekai life by stubbornly doing everything at his own pace. Abundantly surrounded by misanthropes, he tried to redo his life and have an amicable personality…Let’s leave it at that. When starting over with life, returning to one’s mental age was not guaranteed. Probably.
